00020 #ifndef _BACKTRACK_MEMORY_H
00021 #define _BACKTRACK_MEMORY_H
00022 
00023 #include "MemoryBlock.h"
00024 #include "../system/block_cache.h"
00025 
00026 
00027 // \addtogroup Memory
00028 // @{
00029 
00031 /* This class acts like a stack, allowing the backtrackable state to be poped
00032  * and pushed as required during search.
00033  */
00034 class BackTrackMemory
00035 {
00036   NewMemoryBlock new_memory_block;
00037 #ifdef MALLOC_CACHE
00038   BlockCache block_cache;
00039 #endif
00040   
00041 #ifdef BACKTRACK_VEC
00042   vector<char*> backtrack_data; 
00043 #else
00044   char* backtrack_data; 
00045   int current_depth_m;
00046   int max_depth;
00047 #endif
00048   bool locked;
00049 public:
00050     
00051   
00053   MoveablePointer request_bytes(unsigned byte_count)
00054   { 
00055     D_ASSERT(!locked);
00056     return new_memory_block.request_bytes(byte_count); 
00057   }
00058   
00060   template<typename T>
00061   MoveableArray<T> requestArray(unsigned size)
00062   { 
00063     D_ASSERT(!locked);
00064     return new_memory_block.requestArray<T>(size);
00065   }
00066   
00067   BackTrackMemory() :
00068 #ifdef MALLOC_CACHE
00069   block_cache(100),
00070 #endif
00071 #ifdef BACKTRACK_VEC
00072   backtrack_data(10),
00073 #else
00074   backtrack_data(NULL), current_depth_m(0), max_depth(0),
00075 #endif
00076   locked(false)
00077   {
00078       
00079   }
00080   
00081 #ifndef BACKTRACK_VEC
00083   void extend(int new_max)
00084   {
00085     D_ASSERT(locked);
00086     D_ASSERT(new_max > max_depth);
00087     unsigned data_size = new_memory_block.getDataSize();
00088     
00089     char* new_data = (char*)malloc(new_max * data_size);
00090     
00091     memcpy(new_data, backtrack_data, current_depth_m * data_size);
00092     free(backtrack_data);
00093     
00094     max_depth = new_max;
00095     backtrack_data = new_data;
00096   }
00097 #endif
00098   
00099   void lock()
00100   { 
00101     new_memory_block.lock(); 
00102     locked = true;
00103 #ifndef BACKTRACK_VEC
00104     extend(10);
00105 #endif
00106   }
00107   
00109   void world_push()
00110   {
00111     D_ASSERT(locked);
00112     unsigned data_size = new_memory_block.getDataSize();
00113 #ifdef BACKTRACK_VEC
00114 
00115 #ifdef MALLOC_CACHE
00116     char *tmp = (char *) block_cache.do_malloc(data_size);//calloc(data_size, sizeof(char));
00117 #else
00118     char *tmp = (char *) malloc(data_size);
00119 #endif
00120 
00121     memcpy(tmp, new_memory_block.getDataPtr(), data_size);
00122     backtrack_data.push_back(tmp);
00123 #else
00124     if(current_depth_m == max_depth)
00125       extend(max_depth * 2);
00126     memcpy(backtrack_data + current_depth_m * data_size, new_memory_block.getDataPtr(), data_size);
00127     current_depth_m++;
00128 #endif
00129   }
00130   
00132   void world_pop()
00133   {
00134     D_ASSERT(locked);
00135     unsigned data_size = new_memory_block.getDataSize();
00136 #ifdef BACKTRACK_VEC
00137     D_ASSERT(backtrack_data.size() > 0);
00138     char *tmp = backtrack_data.back();
00139     memcpy(new_memory_block.getDataPtr(), tmp, data_size);
00140     backtrack_data.pop_back();
00141 
00142 #ifdef MALLOC_CACHE
00143     block_cache.do_free(tmp);//free(tmp);
00144 #else
00145     free(tmp);
00146 #endif
00147 
00148 #else
00149     D_ASSERT(current_depth_m > 0);
00150     current_depth_m--;
00151     
00152     memcpy(new_memory_block.getDataPtr(), backtrack_data + current_depth_m * data_size, data_size);
00153 #endif
00154   }
00155   
00157   int current_depth()
00158   {
00159 #ifdef BACKTRACK_VEC
00160     return backtrack_data.size();
00161 #else
00162     return current_depth_m;
00163 #endif
00164   }
00165 };
00166 
00167 #endif
